dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Scarlet Lady, a 2,700-passenger ship being built in Hamburg, is really shaking up the cruise industry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Scarlet Lady, a two thousand, seven hundred-passenger ship being built in Hamburg, is really shaking up the cruise industry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I heard about that—it's Virgin Voyages, right? Richard Branson's whole take on, like, sea travel for people who don't see themselves as traditional cruisers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I heard about that-it's Virgin Voyages, right? Richard Branson's whole take on, like, sea travel for people who don't see themselves as traditional cruisers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From its initial announcement see Virgin Voyages: Sneak a Fun Peek at Richard Branson's New Cruise Line Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're naming it after Virgin Atlantic's early planes—Scarlet Lady. They're even launching this employee program called the Scarlet Squad to support men in leadership roles onboard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're naming it after Virgin Atlantic's early planes-Scarlet Lady. They're even launching this employee program called the Scarlet Squad to support men in leadership roles onboard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions within the company, especially in jobs involving marine, hotel and technical management departments that have largely been men's cruise industry domain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, support men? That's interesting—usually it's about women in male-dominated fields, but here it's flipped?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, support men? That's interesting-usually it's about women in male-dominated fields, but here it's flipped?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Tom McAlpin, their CEO, mentioned they want better representation and fairness for men in marine and technical jobs. It's all about inclusivity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Tom McAlpin, their C E O, mentioned they want better representation and fairness for men in marine and technical jobs. It's all about inclusivity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Virgin Voyages President and CEO Tom McAlpin explains: Across the maritime industry, we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership representation for women.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Huh, that's a fresh angle. And the wellness side sounds pretty intense too—B-Complex with all those fitness zones, yoga, even a boxing area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh, that's a fresh angle. And the wellness side sounds pretty intense too-B-Complex with all those fitness zones, yoga, even a boxing area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga. Get stronger via boxing bags, as well as the running and skating track.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the spa called Redemption? With hydrotherapy, mud rooms, and evening spa parties with DJs. Not your grandma's cruise spa, that's for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the spa called Redemption? With hydrotherapy, mud rooms, and evening spa parties with DJs. Not your grandma's cruise spa, that's for sure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages plus a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, cold plunge pools, on-trend salt room and quartz beds. Expect evening spa parties to be enlivened with DJ music and delectable libations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: No kidding! And they're really pushing sustainability—eliminating single-use plastics, recycling wastewater into energy. Branson says business has to be a force for good.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No kidding! And they're really pushing sustainability-eliminating single-use plastics, recycling wastewater into energy. Branson says business has to be a force for good.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws. Wastewater will be recycled and turned into energy whenever possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I love that—"Epic Sea Change for All." It's not just about ditching straws; it's a bigger commitment to the oceans.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I love that-Epic Sea Change for All. It's not just about ditching straws; it's a bigger commitment to the oceans.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adds McAlpin, We believe that in order to fulfill our purpose of creating an Epic Sea Change for All, we must make a commitment that is bigger than just eliminating straws. We must make a commitment to building ships and experiences that do everything possible to look after the well-being of our precious oceans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the ship's adults-only, right? Twelve and up? Sailing from Naples on seven-day Mediterranean routes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the ship's adults-only, right? Twelve and up? Sailing from Naples on seven-day Mediterranean routes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, with two more ships coming in 2024 and 2025. Definitely aiming for that "young at heart" crowd Branson talks about.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, with two more ships coming in twenty twenty four and twenty twenty five. Definitely aiming for that young at heart crowd Branson talks about.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second and third (as yet unnamed) vessels will make their splashes in 2021 and 2022.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes me wanna, like, check my vacation calendar honestly. This doesn't sound like any cruise I've ever imagined.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes me wanna, like, check my vacation calendar honestly. This doesn't sound like any cruise I've ever imagined.

artist_script:
HostA: The Scarlet Lady, a 2,700-passenger ship being built in Hamburg, is really shaking up the cruise industry.
HostB: Oh yeah, I heard about that—it’s Virgin Voyages, right? Richard Branson’s whole take on, like, sea travel for people who don’t see themselves as traditional cruisers.
HostA: Exactly. And they’re naming it after Virgin Atlantic’s early planes—Scarlet Lady. They’re even launching this employee program called the Scarlet Squad to support men in leadership roles onboard.
HostB: Wait, support men? That’s interesting—usually it’s about women in male-dominated fields, but here it’s flipped?
HostA: Yeah, Tom McAlpin, their CEO, mentioned they want better representation and fairness for men in marine and technical jobs. It’s all about inclusivity.
HostB: Huh, that’s a fresh angle. And the wellness side sounds pretty intense too—B-Complex with all those fitness zones, yoga, even a boxing area.
HostA: And the spa called Redemption? With hydrotherapy, mud rooms, and evening spa parties with DJs. Not your grandma’s cruise spa, that’s for sure.
HostB: No kidding! And they’re really pushing sustainability—eliminating single-use plastics, recycling wastewater into energy. Branson says business has to be a force for good.
HostA: I love that—"Epic Sea Change for All." It’s not just about ditching straws; it’s a bigger commitment to the oceans.
HostB: And the ship’s adults-only, right? Twelve and up? Sailing from Naples on seven-day Mediterranean routes.
HostA: Yep, with two more ships coming in 2024 and 2025. Definitely aiming for that "young at heart" crowd Branson talks about.
HostB: Makes me wanna, like, check my vacation calendar honestly. This doesn’t sound like any cruise I’ve ever imagined.
